title: Global mobile video traffic 2017 to 2022
summary: Overall Traffic in PB per month has increased over the Year.
Traffic in PB per month is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Traffic in PB per month, of value 19279.0 was reached at Year 2019
The lowest Traffic in PB per month, of value 12051.0 was reported at Year 2018
